AmountDC.description: Amount in the default currency of the company

AmountDiscount.description: Discount amount in the default currency of the company. Only supported for header

AmountDiscountExclVat.description: Discount amount excluding VAT in the default currency of the company. Only supported for header

AmountFC.description: Amount in the currency of the transaction

AmountFCExclVat.description: Amount exclude VAT in the currency of the transaction. Only supported for header

ApprovalStatus.description: Shows if this sales order is approved

Approver.description: User who approved the sales order

CustomerItemCode.description: Code the customer uses for this item

DeliverTo.description: Reference to the delivery customer. For an existing sales order this value can not be changed.

DeliverToContactPerson.description: Reference to contact person of delivery customer

DeliverToContactPersonFullName.description: Name of contact person of delivery customer

DeliveryStatus.description: Shipping status of the sales order line. 12=Open, 20=Partial, 21=Complete, 45=Cancelled

Discount.description: Discount given on the default price. Discount = (DefaultPrice of Item - PriceItem in line) / DefaultPrice of Item

Document.description: Document that is manually linked to the sales order

IncotermVersion.description: Version of Incoterm  Supported version for Incoterms : 2010, 2020

InvoiceStatus.description: Invoice status of the sales order line. 12=Open, 20=Partial, 21=Complete, 45=Cancelled

InvoiceTo.description: Reference to the customer who will receive the invoice. For an existing sales order this value can not be changed.

InvoiceToContactPerson.description: Reference to the contact person of the customer who will receive the invoice

InvoiceToContactPersonFullName.description: Name of the contact person of the customer who will receive the invoice

InvoiceToName.description: Name of the customer who will receive the invoice

Item.description: Reference to the item that is sold in this sales order line

Margin.description: Sales margin of the sales order line

NetPrice.description: Net price of the sales order line

OrderedBy.description: Customer who ordered the sales order. For an existing sales order this value can not be changed.

OrderedByContactPerson.description: Contact person of the customer who ordered the sales order

OrderedByContactPersonFullName.description: Name of contact person of the customer who ordered the sales order

OrderedByName.description: Name of the customer who ordered the sales order

OrderID.description: The OrderID identifies the sales order. All the lines of a sales order have the same OrderID

PaymentCondition.description: The payment condition used for due date and discount calculation

Project.description: The project to which the sales order line is linked. The project can be different per line. Sometimes also the project in the header is filled although this is not really used

PurchaseOrder.description: Purchase order that is linked to the sales order

PurchaseOrderLine.description: Purchase order line of the purchase order that is linked to the sales order

PurchaseOrderLineNumber.description: Number of the purchase order line

Quantity.description: The number of items sold in default units. The quantity shown in the entry screen is Quantity * UnitFactor. Positive quantity = Sales order lines, Negative quantity = Trade-in lines.

Status.description: The status of the sales order. 12 = Open, 20 = Partial, 21 = Complete, 45 = Cancelled.

UnitPrice.description: Price per unit in the currency of the transaction

UseDropShipment.description: Indicates if drop shipment is used (delivery directly to customer, invoice to wholesaler)

VATAmount.description: VAT amount in the currency of the transaction

VATPercentage.description: The vat percentage of the VAT code. This is the percentage at the moment the sales order is created. It's also used for the default calculation of VAT amounts and VAT base amounts

YourRef.description: The reference number of the customer
